title: 352 16 "A Belief Worth Begging to Live for!! Brook Defends His Afro"Transliteration: "Shinnen no Inochigoi!! Afuro o Mamoru Burukku" (Japanese:信念の命乞い!! アフロを守るブルック) Sumio Watanabe Yoshiyuki Suga May 4, 2008(2008-05-04)[18] July 10, 2016
transformers_text: 352 16 A Belief Worth Begging to Live for Brook Defends His Afro Transliteration Shinn en no In och i goi A furo o Mamoru B uruk ku Japanese Sumi o Watanabe Yoshiyuki Suga May 4 2008 2008 05 04 18 July 10 2016 Brook confronts R yuma recalling his time on Thriller Bark five years prior and his first battle with R yuma and how he lost to a zombie with his own shadow R yuma mocks Brook for being so careful about his afro and the two engage in another battle Oars meanwhile continues to exhibit Luffy's personality traits as he devours most of Thriller Bark's food while declaring his desire to be King of the Pirates
tf_idf_text: belief worth beg live brook defend afro transliteration shinn och goi furo mamoru uruk japanese sumi watanabe yoshiyuki suga may july brook confronts yuma recall time thriller bark five year prior first battle yuma lose zombie shadow yuma mock brook careful afro two engage another battle oars meanwhile continue exhibit luffys personality trait devour thriller bark food declare desire king pirate
